dashboard.description: Strategic insights and high-level KPIs for executive decision-making

widgets.title: Revenue Overview (Last 30 Days)
widgets.query: SELECT SUM(total_amount) as total_revenue FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAYS

widgets.title: Total Transactions
widgets.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT transaction_id) as transactions FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAYS

widgets.title: Active Customers
widgets.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) as customers FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAYS

widgets.title: Performance by Region
widgets.query: SELECT sp.region, AVG(sp.avg_daily_sales) as avg_sales, AVG(sp.sales_vs_target_ratio) as target_ratio FROM store_performance sp GROUP BY sp.region ORDER BY avg_sales DESC

widgets.title: Top Performing Stores
widgets.query: SELECT store_name, region, avg_daily_sales, sales_vs_target_ratio FROM store_performance ORDER BY avg_daily_sales DESC LIMIT 10

widgets.title: Revenue by Category
widgets.query: SELECT c.category_name, SUM(s.total_amount) as revenue FROM sales s JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id WHERE s.sale_date >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 30 DAYS GROUP BY c.category_name ORDER BY revenue DESC

widgets.title: Monthly Revenue Trend
widgets.query: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', sale_date) as month, SUM(total_amount) as revenue FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 12 MONTHS GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('month', sale_date) ORDER BY month
